Reviews.Title: Best deal i ever get
Reviews.Author: nic
Reviews.Content: This was a very cool deal... i got lot of things which i never expected at the price i got. nice camera and nice accessories. i recomend you all to buy this

Reviews.Title: Great combo!
Reviews.Author: A
Reviews.Content: I got this as a starter kit and researched for a long time before keeping an eye out for falling/raising prices; this package was just right and is still one of the best cameras and deals out there for SLR starter camera.  18-135mm lens was a great choice too!
